title: Minor fixes for IndicatorHistory and IV
body:
<!--- Provide a general summary of your changes in the Title above -->

#### Description
<!--- Describe your changes in detail -->
- Minor fix for IndicatorHistory, use ScaledRaw data normalization mode for option indicators. Adding unit test
- Expand the IV expected upper range to 400%, given values can be higher than previous value of 200%
![image](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/assets/18473240/4f8607b6-b89a-4d3e-82c7-2df8e1ffbbd1)

- Adjust IV to use smoothing function only when both option calculations succeed
